content.detailedDescription: I was up at about 5am walked outside and after getting the dairy ready i started to put feed in our bins for the day and i looked up and saw this big bright white circle light moving to the west really slow and finally dissapeard after about 4 or 5 min or so, i am also a paranormal investagator. thanks *(name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) and i did not have my camcorder did not have enough time to get back to the house, it would have been gone then.
content.summary: Round bright white circle at 5:30am moving slowly to the west.

content.detailedDescription: i was sitting in my back yard, getting ready to look at the at stars with my telescope.(i got one for christmas)..Because, i have seen things in the sky before.I have never reported them.I was just getting set up. i noticed (what looked like a very bright star) going across the sky.It was going just a little faster than an airplane.From the south  to the north, a lot lower than a plane would fly.I could see it very easy.I didn't have to use my telescope.It went north until it was gone from view..I was so excited i knew this was not an airplane. i want inside to get my binoculars (just incase).As soon as i walked outside something caught my eye to the north/east. another one !! i watched it go all the way across the sky going east to west, it was in clear view. the weirdest thing,, when it got to the path of where the first one was 'it vanished'.It was like some one turning a light off. right after that happened. another one!! i was like oh my god. this is amazing..This one followed the same exact path of the first one, it did not vanish, it kept going until it was out of view. to the t 'literally'..The first and third followed a path like the top of a t and the second was like the bottom of the t ending right at the line of the top.All of this happened in 10 minutes time..I was freaking out, because after the first one i jokingly said a big "hello."and then after the second and third ones,,i was like this is getting spooky.I had the feeling they were watching me too! or something was..I have been praying for gods help with the oil spill. and i asked for their help too. kind of. and i was like. ooooooooh what did i do? watch what you ask for. i cowardly went inside. lol. gonna charge my cam corder for tonight..And make sure im not alone.I noticed there are alot of people seeing these star looking ufo's lately. i live near an airport, they made no noise. i know this was not planes..I know this was not stars. what were they??? and my phone wasn't working at the time.. because my son tried to call me and all he got was a loud noise.
content.summary: South louisiana,,saw 3 stars fly across the sky. a little faster than a plane. brighter than brightest star..No blinking lights.

content.detailedDescription: A ball of light almost cigar shape, exploded up to 30 red balls made a formation and disapeared. called the cops they said they had an officer who seen it.I was fishing at the time with 2 other witnesses. one of them saw it. the police called me back askied if they could use my name in a miltary report. over 2 hours later as we were leaving . they reappeared. coming from the ground up as floating orange balls every about 30 secounds in high speeds. at that point there were up to at least 12 at one time in the sky.There were more but everytime one or two would appear another one would dissapate. i called the police back, they said they called the military and the airport police, i asked if anyone else had called in they would not commemt. i was told there was nothing they could do.
content.summary: 2 sightings same night.

content.detailedDescription:
While attending the screening of indiana jones "raiders of the lost ark" at horner park (cpd)last night 6/26/2010. i noticed a white circular object in the sky, it appeared out of the western horizon, its line of flight was in a north-eastern direction. it travel at about the same altitude, it did not appear to zig-zag around. 

sitting at the base of the hill in horner park, i had a clear view of the night sky. my son and i watched it for about a minute or so when it flew into some high thin clouds in the north-eastern sky. i was amazing that we were able to see it for a few more seconds only due to how bright it was.

my opinion is was not a plane or helicopter... the light imitating from the object was pure white, we saw saw it from three angles front-below-behind.

plenty of o'hare flight traffic heading in eastern flight path, my guess is the had to seen it.

later while standing line getting popcorn my son asked the person in front us did they see the bright light? the woman commented that she did. 

i checked the local news wires in chicago this morning no stories reported... 

i saw one posting from batavia for 6/26/2010, but what they described is not what we witnessed.
content.summary: White circle in chicago night sky 6/26/2010.

content.detailedDescription: Bbqing and looked up at a contrail and saw four orbs , they looked 3-d from shadows. they looked higher than the contrail. took 4 pic with a casioexilim 4 mp camera, which show the contrail and a couple of orbs. dont know how to put them on the computer.  the orbs slowly moved due west, until they disappeared
content.summary: 4 orbs emerge from contrail.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my front porch having a smoke before retiring, at almost exactly 3:30 in the morning.  i saw a very bright light that moved fluidly along at what seemed a low altitude.  it was brighter than the brightest star, and moving too fast to be a satellite or space station, and as fast as is was going had to be lower to the ground than cruising altitude, yet i did not hear a sound.  i see planes coming and going from pdx airport, and though i thought it strange to hear nothing, on a quiet sunday morning, with little traffic or other noise, i wasn't scared as much as facinated.  i called to my partner to come see it, but he was fast asleep.  i didn't want to stop watching it, so i stayed outside and watched it move past, over the course of several minutes.  there were no unusual flight characteristics, such as rapid course corrections or such, just a steady smooth movement across the sky, and i got really confused when i realized that what i thought must be landing lights on a conventional craft, where just as bright after it has passed my position and likewise as it receded in the distance (rear landing lights??) to the east over gresham towards the mountain (hood).  i was not able to capture an image, and only hope that others saw it and will report it.  if the light was jet afterburners, i would have heard something.  the air base at hanford fly over portland occasionally, and you know it - even in the daytime.

i'm not an aviation expert, but i'm very techno-savvy and grew up across from an airport, and was "fooled" by a plane with ad lighting set-up under it when i was a kid.  i know one can be fooled under the right circumstances into thinking you saw a ufo.  this was nothing like that.  solid light, not wavering or shimmering that i could see, just a steady light moving slowly and soundlessly overhead and off to the east.  i called the atc for portland to see if there was anything unusual on their radar, but of course they were unavailable.  i would like to know if it was a known flight or if i am hallucinating!!  it was not a small plane.  it was too low and quiet to be a jet.  no standard aviation lights.  i really don't know what it was, and i'm more than scared that it moved so easily and uncontested almost directly over our home. *(info deleted--sgonzalez/cms. doesn't anyone in government care anymore about our air security?  are these things just accepted as a matter of course?

please, please let me know if there are any other reports of this event.  some validation would help settle my nerves.
content.summary: Non-blinking, bright light, moved slowly past, west to east over portland, light as bright from behind!?

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were out looking around our parts for some supposed parnormals in albuquerque. as we were headed home to the east of us we saw an extremely bright light coming towards us meaing it was traveling west  for at the most 10 seconds then it disappeared. about 5 seconds later it reappeared so far east of us again and instantly disappeared. we wanted to retrace our steps and see if that happened again as were headed west it reappeared so far in the east to where i believe was as far as gallup. it would appear bright then dim then have ovals around it and so many different appearances. i still have the chills. what was this. it was so short we never even thought or got the chance to get pictures.
content.shape: Cigar,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: Two sightings first to the east then to the west.

content.detailedDescription: At about 10:30pm, i had just arrived at my apartment complex when i spotted this one bright orange light in the sky. it wobbled from left to right as it slowly headed south before changing it's direction to the west. as it moved toward the west, the orange light expanded and then dimmed and i could no longer see the object. some apartments would soon block my view of it anyway so i walked upstairs to my apartment balcony, hoping to possibly see the object again since i would now have a view of where it was going. i then saw the object still moving west but at a faster speed. at this point it still had no lights on and it looked like a gray or white craft shaped like an oval. i lost sight of it over my neighboring apartments. it was exhilarating, i only wish i had footage to share.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orange ufo turns it's lights off over the city.

content.detailedDescription:
This even occurred about 20 minuets ago, the memory is fresh.

i was driving home about 12:04 when i looked over at the moon (southern part of the sky)
i saw 3 orange points of light moving from south to north.

i pulled over on the side of the road and stepped out of the car to watch the event, the objects were silent during the event.

i am an armature astronomer, these objects were certainly not any planets, satellites, or shooting stars. the brightest of the objects was about -4. the others about -2 or -3.

the objects were at about 25 degrees above the horizon when i first observed them. and were about 35 degrees above the horizon when they faded out and disappeared. the objects were first observed in the south east, and disappeared in the east.
content.summary: Orange fireballs.

content.detailedDescription: I was stepping out of my car and saw a large commercial aircraft very low on approach to gallatin field when suddenly i saw what i initially thought was an eagle swoop around and speed up straight towards the plane. my 1st thought was this huge eagle was about to hit the plane when suddenly it did a zig zag like manuver to miss the plane, it then slowed and continued to fly past the plane heading east. i tracked it for as long as i could which was about a minute until it was to far away to see. i know for sure that what ever it was had to be seen by the pilots! the plane even jerked a bit as if it had hit turbulence or the pilot had jerked in surprise. it was  clear blue sky and calm conditions. within 2 hours of this 2 very large military helicopters dual blade troop carriers were flying around the same general area. as a side note, i am hoping by filing this report more people will come forward, it was right above a large area of construction on interstate 90 and above wal-mart during a busy time of day!
content.summary: Dark orb/sphere metallic shine from sun.

content.detailedDescription:
four of us were standing on the deck at our house in west houston and we saw the first star of the evening in the western sky. then we saw another bright object appear, moving across the sky near the star. at first we thought it was a plane, but then we realized it was much brighter than a plane. it was at least twice as bright as the star it was near. it shone with a steady light and was circular to oval in shape. it continued moving upward as we watched, and then it just disappeared. it was far above the horizon and there was no place it could have gone.
i was always a ufo skeptic and joked about my husband who is a believer. so this is the first ufo i've ever seen.
content.summary: We observed a large  whiteish blue moving object  near the first star in the western sky but twice as large. it grew brighter and then disappeared as were looking right at it .

content.detailedDescription: We were having a bbq in my back yard.  my sister in law was relaxing on the deck looking at the sky and she said, hey what are those two balls in the sky?  the two white balls of light appeared first, and we watched them move away from each other.  one started moving higher, and the other moved east.  we didn't know what they were, but we knew they weren't planes. when we grabbed the binoculars, they just looked like balls of light that were moving through the sky.  approx. 20 minutes in, another one appeared and it was red.  it moved to the east at first, very quickly, then it stopped, and began moving up, higher.  eventually they all dissapeared.  my whole family watched them for 45 minutes.
content.summary: Glowing balls of light moving through the sky and changing direction.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying out at the pool with friends, i waqs looking at the clouds, columbus type,noticed to holes punched into the clouds, were you could see blue sky. as i looked at the clouds, at about 11 0clock high, i noticed a brown comtrail that went into the clouds, actually it was well above the clouds,but just as i was looking a sphere grey in color appears from nowhere under the clouds, i watch it for a few seconds, (the size of a pea at 5 ft away distance wise it was apx 10 miles away, south of me going west.,) as it moved past the clouds into open blue sky, it changed white in color as the sun hit,i also saw like a gold color rim as it changed white. i watch it travel maybe 3 miles past the cloud going west, and as it changed colors it blink and i thought to myself it see's me. just then it disappeared into the blue sky.Well i told my friends they said yeah right. about 1 minute later, still looking at the sky, out of nowhere and father west 12 oclock high, in pure blue sky i see what now looks like a meteorite falling from the sky apx 100,000 ft, it left a short white comtrail, it was falling several thousands of miles per hour,i saw a redish point size of a pixtel, i showed my friend he yelled that aint no jet going that fast, as it was falling it like turned the comtrail on and off then it stayed on, it then seemed to level off and head out towards iowa, we could see it's pure white short comtrail. as we were watching i noticed a brown comtrail so high i couldnt make out what kind of jet it was, chasing after, ufo, but the speed of ufo was several times faster, this lasted about 3 mins until i couldnt see comtrail from ufo i saw it till it faded out of my eyesight. it seem like it came in at a 60 degree angle staying above the horizon,it was so fast. the moment i saw the orb, i new it was a ufo,i was prepared to track it with eyesight but it disappeared, when i saw metorite i new it was the orb,and it was getting out of here, then about a minute later jet appears. i think jet was after this thing and was the first comtrail i saw going east, and orb appears, and goes west. under the clouds, while comtrail was well above clouds. orb was apx 5-10 thousand feet high when i saw it. afterwards i tried to evaluate what i saw, and i know what i saw was not man made.I am now reporting this to you, and hope you find some evidence of this.
content.summary: Orb appears out of cloud, and in blue sky, goes from grey to pure white and disappears.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i went for a farm country drive in our convertible when i got home from work (i work second shift).  the night was fairly warm and we drove with the top down.  there was a large moon a few days from being full and it lit up the sky pretty well and the stars were not very prominent.  i saw a jet airplane at a distance and i mentioned it to my wife.  she said she saw it but she saw another that did not have flashing lights.  she pointed directly over our heads and she said it was a triangle.  i looked up and it was very clearly a large isosolese triangle with glowing  yellow/orange (or rich egg yolk colored)lights at each corner.  the lights were not lights in the usual sense in that they did not seem to project light but radiated it like a hot eye on a stove.  the edges of the light were very distinct and not fuzzy.  the triangle was black and it was seen clearly against the background of the sky.

the triangle appeared to be at high altitude (i would guess 20000 feet) and traveling at a speed a little faster than the jet.  there was a fairly large separation between the two but they did seem to be converging.  the jet was making the normal sound but the black triangle did not emit any sound and it seemed to move very smoothly.  we watched the triangle move away from us and i observed the apparent altitude to gauge if it was close to the ground or high as it appeared.  it was at a high altitude and did not seem close to the ground when it was futher away.

we had stopped in the road to watch the triangle during this time but another car came up behind us and i had to drive away.  my wife continued to watch the triangle and i would glance as i could.  it remained visible for some time and she noticed that it turned to the right (away from the airplane) in a very smooth manner.  she said she saw the orientation of the three lights changed when it turned.

we lost sight of the triangle because of the hills and trees and i checked my watch to get an approximate time of our sighting.

we have no doubt about what we saw and we do not care if anyone believes us.  we would be interested to know if anyone else saw it.

we had no apprehension when we saw it.  it was not an airplane.  we hope this information is helpful.
content.summary: Large black isosilese triangle with a yellow/orange light near each corner.

content.detailedDescription: Hi my name is (*name deleted--sgonzalez/cms), my son (**name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) and i were going on a bike ride by the river to go fishing. so, we brought the camera in case we caught a fish or something else that was cool.After finding a turtle and taking pictures of it, we noticed it was getting late around 9:00pm so, we decided to leave. biking back on the path heading west i happened to turn my head to the north and saw this very distinct dark object in the sky which appeared over the church in the far distance(the higest peak in the city) approx 1-2 km away from us above the church but, it seemed further away than that and a few hundred feet high possibly a thousand. at first i thought it was a hot air balloon but, i've seen those before and i knew it wasn't that so, we watched it to see if it was moving but it didn't go up or down or side ways it appeared to be slightly pulsating in one spot,in arms length it would be the size of a larger asprine but smaller than a dime.After watching it for a few minutes i remembered i had my camera so i took two pictures zoomed in at 14 times but it still wasn't close enough to see good with the camera. i told my son we need to get closer to it to get a better picture! he didn't want to but, we decided to go to the fire hall to get closer apprx 1-1 1/2 minute bike ride when we got there it was gone, nothing in the sky at all. my reaction was "what the!!" where did it go? i have seen this type of object before except a lot larger and in a different city but, this time i had a picture! to show what we saw.
content.summary: Very defined in colour as if it were painted in the sky like a black hole.

content.detailedDescription: I noticed a white star-like object from my front yard about 30 degrees above the south eastern horizon.It appeared white and was brighter than venus. the motion was uniform and towards the east. i ran inside to get my camera and found the object to be much fainter to the eye. i took 6 photos by pointing the camera in the general direction of the object. it appeared to brighten again as it approached the trees. in all i observed it for about 3 minutes.I found the variation in brightness interesting.
content.summary: A white sphere, or egg shaped object was photographed low in the south east that varied in brightness.

content.detailedDescription: Thursday evening i went out to have a smoke, there was a small plane circling over my residence, for an hour (more or less)...It was late and the plane was noisy..I was wondering why it was flying so low late at night in circles...That alone was unusual, i live a mile away from olympia airport, for the past 13 years, and see planes come and go...This airport is small and it's rare when you see planes flying low late at night...I watched him, and i saw a (what looked like) bright orb fly by, close to the plane..Not right next to the plane but to me it appeared to be at the same altitude, maybe a mile away north east of the plane as i was watching it...I wondered if the person/persons in the plane saw it...The object flew into a low dark cloud, and i thought mmmmm wonder if that was a ufo...It was too low to be a satellite,and within less than 10 minutes i saw another one coming from the same general area...This one headed east, i think, and i thought, hmmm is that the same object???I was talking to my adult son in nevada last night about this, telling him that i thought i saw an orb or two the other night...Regardless, the only reason i am reporting this is because of the report 23941 in tumwater that i read today...I have seen objects in the past, one very close in tumwater last year...I really don't like advertising because most people do not look up at the sky, and when they do many would just ignore, shake their heads, not even bother to question what they just saw...I have seen many people throughout the years do just that...But to the person who reported this, i live down the hill from you,  off of little rock and 70th closer to the airport and the airplane was flying in a circle and over my home...What you saw (whatever it is) was real, and lower than what i think you saw from your vantage point, but it may have climbed in altitude and was of course at a different point when you saw it...And i think there were two orbs, not just one...So now it would be nice if whoever was flying that plane late that night would speak up if he/she saw it too, it was very very close to the plane, and they would have had a great vantage point...
content.summary: Saw the same event as described in tumwater #23941.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Let me try to set the stage for my "ufo event." 

my family and i live in west portsmouth, ohio. 
my father has been in the va hospital in hunnington for a few days, so my mother and i have been traveling back and forth for his stay.  after yesterday's visit, i decided to drop my mother off at our home and go to work to pick up my pay check around 10:00 p.M. friday night. 

upon my return, i pulled into our driveway, got out of my truck, and something, i don't remember what exactly, made me think to look toward the sky.  i approximate that what i saw was above carl perkin's bridge and moving along the river towards lucasville, ohio.

it was, as i remember, oval to spherically shaped.  it's hard to tell the exact shape because it seemed, against the dark night sky, to be 2-d rather than 3-d. quickly, but i have to admit i hesitated because i didn't want to lose sight of it, i went inside the house to get my mother.  i wanted her to confirm what i was seeing.  she came outside, and sure enough, it was still traveling in the same area i had left it.  my mom could see it too.  neither of us could think of what it might be.  often we've looked toward the sky and noticed planes overhead.  but at the distance they fly above, they look like little bleeping lights.  

what we saw, was not a commercial airliner.

eventually, after we watched for a minute longer, the object continued to travel in line of the river toward lucasville until it was no longer visible.


my discription in depth:
imagine an apple core. the top and the bottom flared out... the middle area, i imagine must have been spinning quickly around the apple core axis, because it was slightly lighter in color.
as it began to fade off into the distance, it would blink blues and reds...Or more like, twinkle.

as this is the end of my narrative, i must apologize for the constant use of "it."  if i knew what "it" was, for sure, without a doubt, i would try to be more conscious of my redundancy.
content.summary: Flashing ufo in ohio river valley.

content.detailedDescription:
Just right after sunset hour and a brillant venus appeared in west, i went outside in my front porch and ate my ice cream and all suddenly spot a twlight light through the lushy tall trees from my south view. thought it was a star at first but it kept moving toward east at pretty fast speed in comparing to any airplanes i can know. realized it must be appeared from nowhere at this moment when i saw it. moreover, i live here for 14 years and never see such flying object toward to east, except any emergency flight routines. the flight shows no flash or blink at all. the flight gracefully hovered over the mount shasta and flied down as it traveled in east.

since i am deaf and can't tell if it emits any sounds. though i am very observed person with well-educated background and have been familiar with any ufo sightings but this one finally i saw in real experience in 14 years in this area!! 

my emotion had no reaction at all toward this incident for i know that ufo sightings occurred in any part of this world everyday. but this is for a real! historically mt. shasta had often ufo sightings in the past. however, this time finally it comes back!

however, i keep checking for incoming any more activities in this area and try to capture them in video if possible.
content.summary: Yellowish-white brilliant star-like hovers straight to east

content.detailedDescription:
It was a very nice sunny day here in kettering, england, uk. it was about 1800-1815 and the sun stays up till 2145 so visibility was very good. as i was driving i saw in the distance which i first thought was a plane, it went round in circle and then it disappeared. it was like some kind of reflection, it was very high in the sky, close to 1km above ground and 3 to 4 miles away from me. there were no clouds any where near the object.

i kept driving and i saw this happened twice again, the reflection circled almost like it was a circle shape. and the reflection diameter was hugh. the object itself was not visible, i could see the sky right through it. the ufo was stationary high above ground. the reflection colour was in white, and the reflection was a rectangle shape circling the object, only the sun reflection gave it away. after the reflection, it was as if it wasnt there. the reflection rectangle size was about the same as the wings from a 747, one end to the other.

i never lost sight of it, but after the reflection it was completely invisible, but it was still up there, the object was colourless.
because this was my first sighting, i didnt think much of it right after and continued driving, though i still wonders what that is. that there were something high above the ground wanted to remain unseen, possibly looking down on us.

my feelings right now is could there be more of this around , i travelled the same stretch of road nearly everyday, i occasionly look up at where i saw the ufo. 

i think this is a very cunning technology, whatever it is.
content.summary: Camoflauged, transparent, see-thru ufo that was not visible in daylight.

content.detailedDescription: Decided to watch for the orbs that i reported to you yesterday. my husband and i went out onto the patio around 9:30 pm. at exactly 10:08 pm the bright white orb showed up. it traveled w to e staying right above the mountain. as usual no sound is heard. we estimated 5 to 10,000 feet. moving about 200 mph. about the same speed as a jetliner. the higher elevation orbs were absent this time. however the orb that flies lower seems to be getting bolder. again a small plane was in the area at the time of our sighting. also numerous jets flying into the nj and ny airports were going about their business. being a friday night, air traffic was heavy. however, all this activity didn't seem to deter this orb. this may sound strange.....It seems to want to be seen. we have noticed that our six year old australian cattle dog has been extremely anxious for the past few nights. she pants alot even though we have air conditioning on. her anxiety begins before we even go outside. if i bring her out with me she keeps running into the woods as if on chase. she comes back after a couple mins. even though i remain calm, she is on high alert the whole time. i will continue to report these sightings until they stop happening. as i said yesterday, i already have one of your investigators in contact with me. i am so grateful for this forum to share information with you and the public.
content.summary: White orb makes appearance 3rd night in a row.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my room at computer reading mails, for a pure case i looked out of the window and saw these strange spheres floating in the sky...At first sight i was thinking they were birds, but soon i discovered that the shapes was too circular for to be birds.
the objects moving from west to est just over my head with an angle of 70��� north. they went into a cloud and disappeared.Because was not possible to see the end of the cloud from my window, i was run to a balcony for to film the coming out, but them are not comes out...As disappeared in the cloud.
i took some photos after few seconds as proof of what i'm sayng.
two minute later two planes passed in the sky from north to south and another one from south to north. this latest one disappeared in the cloud  and never come out as well.
i was wait about 10 minutes but everything in the sky is finished.
no particular sounds, wind or birds in the sky.
i send you also the photo of the plane disappeared and a photo taken few minutes after the orbs are disappeared behind the cloud.
content.summary: About 15 white spheres passing in the sky and disappeared behind a cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
i was on ship island, ms. for a picnic. it was a clear day and i was with my wife. i was taking scenic pictures from under a covered decking. i never heard any other picnickers mentioning anything in the sky. 
 it was on june 26th, 2010 (two weeks later) that i noticed something. while gazing at my picture i noticed something out of the ordinary. when i zoomed in i could see a triangle shaped object and a circular object in very close proximity to each other (it looks like they are practically touching from the angle of the photo). a second picture i have also shows something but not as discernable as the first.

about the picture: 
i was using a fujitsu digital camera.I believe the settings were at 5 megapixel and i was slightly zoomed in when taking the picture. 

near the upper center of the picture and above a very green pointy bush you'll see what appears to be a speck or something. if you zoom in you will see the shapes i describe.

i think its fantastic that an innocent scenic picture turned out a possible ufo!
content.summary: Ship island scenic picture. didn't see ufo on the day. i saw the ufo a week later when reviewing picture!

content.detailedDescription: We live in a 3 story house the front is glass all the way up 3 floors. i can see the stars every night as i am in bed. this nite i lay watching tv i saw a bright light hovering over the tree line , i noticed it and thought wow that star is bright. then i thought it couldnt be a star its too low and if it were a plane it would crash in a min. as i watched tv i kept glancing at it every little bit. i saw it get real bright then dim. it was there more than 30 min. then it started moving around so i had to keep looking through the trees to find it. then it just moved off. about a day or 2 later as i was in bed watching tv a bright flash of light appeared in the glass it caught my attention as i looked i caught it moving to the left out of my sight. i thought i just saw a ghost a orb.I  thought it was inside the window.  it startled me and i kept my eyes fixed on the glass , then it came back across to the right i got a good look this time and saw it was on the outside of the glass.It was bright white and transparent almost. about twice or 3 times the size of a basketball. when i realized it was like dancing in the window and i really was seeing it. i threw back the covers and jumped up in the bed, it was only 15 feet at most from me. when i stood up in bed it was like it saw me too and just vanished. i would like to know what this was and if it has been seen before in this area.
content.summary: Bright orb light.

content.detailedDescription: Let me first start by saying i didn't know whether to post this on mufon as i'm really not sure it's characteristic of a typical sighting.  we were experiencing a typical florida downpour with some occasional thunder and lightning, but nothing out of the ordinary.  i'm not really sure whether we had lost power at this point as things got a little out of the ordinary.  i was sitting in our living room with my family and we all heard a loud humming noise that carried with it a certain vibration indicative of a powerful energy source.  it sounded like a transformer humming, but much, much louder.  the sound lasted about 10 seconds and happened 3 or 4 times and was coming from what seemed to be directly outside the south side of our house.  our house is nowhere near a transformer.  from where we sat during this, we were two rooms away from the exterior of the south side of our house, about 30 feet away.  as the humming noise began again, i finally decided to walk to a room closer to the sound.  keep in mind it's summer around 6:45pm, so there was plenty of light outside, even though the storm had darkened it a bit.  this room has blinds on the windows and as i approached the window the humming was still happening, but what was so odd, and the main reason for me posting this is, even with it being daylight, a bright bluish, neon looking light was being generated somewhere very close to the exterior of our house with such an intensity that it overpowered the natural light and created a bluish glow that shined through the cracks in the window blinds.  it's almost as if it was dark outside and a car pulled up outside the window, shining it's headlights into the window.  i pulled the blinds to the side and saw a powerful blue glow coming from the side of my house.  the window i viewed it from did not have a direct view of the light source, but i did see it emanating around the corner.  my house is a couple hundred feet from power lines, but they are in the opposite direction from where the light was coming from.  looking out the south facing window, the power lines are approximately 200 feet to the west and this light was definitely coming from the south east side of my house.  the light source appeared to be generated within feet of the exterior of my house and couldn't have been more than 5 feet off the ground.  there were no lightning strikes taking place while the humming noise and lights occurred, so i know it wasn't lightning.  we don't have a transformer next to our house.  the only thing over there is my ac unit.  after the storm passed, i walked out there and there was no evidence anything had happened, and my ac was undamaged.  i've lived in florida most of my life and have seen some serious storms, but never, never have i seen a sustained blue glowing light shine through my window.  with the amount of energy it must have taken to generate that light, i expected to either have major electrical damage or at least have black marks on my house, but there was nothing.  by far one of the oddest experiences i've ever had.
content.summary: Blue humming light.

content.detailedDescription:
It was a little after 10pm and me and my boyfriend were in the kitchen making  a late dinner. so we got the food going on the stove and my boyfriend decided that he was going to go outside and have a cigarette. he asked if i would come outside with him and i told him i was going to clean some of the dishes instead. about after a minute of him being outside he cracked the front door open and told me i needed to come out and look at something. a second after that he repeated himself and said that i needed to come out right at that moment and to come look at what he was seeing. i said "okay, okay i'm coming!" and ran out the door. as i stepped outside my boyfriend was looking straight to the sky and was pointing upward and told me to look. 
 at first i thought it was a really bright star but then saw that it was moving and just immediately thought it was a jet. right after that i saw the object in the sky did not have a stream line behind it, no blinking lights, and that it was moving at a very very fast speed-much faster than any jet could ever be. it looked like a star except it looked much larger and brighter than anything else in the sky and after another moment of examining it you could see that the object had three separate lights on it. i then ran back to the house and opened the door and yelled for my sister to come outside immediately.
 she ran out to see what the commotion was. as we watched the object flying through the sky we saw that it started to change course and started to curve to our left towards the north east coming from the west. while it was doing this the bright sphere's light pulsated to the point where it was so dim you almost lost sight of it but then became bright again right away. we could also tell that while the object was shifting course it was ascending upwards. the lights pulsated again and i decided to run into the house  to grab my cell phone to see if i could capture any documentation. i came back out and my sister told me that the lights on the craft completely had went out and came back on when i got back outside. after another moment the lights pulsated again until it eventually disappeared into the sky. mind you it was not that we lost sight of it through the tree line or anything it just disappeared into the sky at approximately 10:16 p.M. 
 this is the first real sighting i have ever had. when i realized that this object was not a star or a plane my adrenaline was pulsing and it felt as if my heart was going to pound through my chest. a part of me was amazed and another part of me was frightened that it was going to turn back around. i was quit in shock to be honest. my boyfriend was shocked, amazed, and kind of excited about the sighting. my sister rather was very scared and somewhat emotional about the whole experience. i am not the type of person to just jump to conclusions but i know is that this was not a human object nor was it a star so what else could it have been???
content.summary: Round glowing star-like object that had three lights on it moving fast and had pulsating lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my patio, facing the north, when i saw a bright orange light. at first, i thought it was the headlights of an oncoming plane. it was slowing coming towards my position, getting bigger and bigger. i heard no noise. i was waiting for it to go past me to hear the engine noise and to see what exactly it was. i got my camera and was able to take several pictures. once it flew over me, i heard nothing and also all i was able to see was still a bright orange ball fly past silently. there was no apparent plane, helicopter, or any aircraft shape. i felt scared. i never have seen anything like this. the orange ball continued to fly in the same path when it made an angular direction change. it looked like an 40 degree angle up. it wasn't a slow change, it was an instant change of direction. it was the kind of direction change you see in video games. after that it just disappeared as it ascended up. since then, i have seen the same thing on 4/29/09 @ 10:13pm and on 6/10/10 @ 10:07pm. the first two pictures are from the 4/22/09 incident. the last picture is from the 4/29/09 incident. i zoomed in a lot on the 4/22/09 pictures. i didn't zoom in on the 4/29/09 picture. notice the angular shape of the 4/22/09 pictures! i was amazed when i looked at them, after the fact!
content.summary: Orange fireball moving through sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was hanging out with my cousin out on a country road. we were watching the sunset. while my cousin was talking i noticed what i assumed to be a plane because it was silver and long (cigar shaped). it moved left, stopped then turned around going right. it lit up with a white light for about a minute. it went dim and bright and then by the time i really realized it was a ufo and told my cousin to look it vanished. we stayed there for awhile and i saw a "plane" move nw. it stopped in flight and disappeared. my cousin barely missed it again. then after it got dark and a lengthy deep conversation, we got up and got ready to leave. while i was telling a story, my cousin said he saw what appeared to be an object fly through the trees just beyond the field we were at. he said it looked like it found a clearing, flew through it and took off. there were red and white lights that seemed to be spinning. we got out of there pretty quick. this was the 2nd time i have seen one in this area and it was with the same person.
content.summary: Taunted by ufos again.

content.detailedDescription:
I can't say for sure what it was.  my wife and i were out in the front yard, which faces the hills across the valley.  it looks out in an e/ne direction.  i was smoking, looking at the moon.  there was a litle haze, and some partial/light clouds.  i could see most of the brighter stars, the dipper, etc., and planes were visible on their normal flight routes.  

when i turned back towards the hills, i saw a light orange object, planet-like, next to the hill, about 20 degrees above the horizon.  i was surprised, because i hadn't noticed it before.  it wasn't in the right place to be a planet, but that's what it appeared to be.  there was a jet flying along its normal approximate s/n route, which passes a little more than thumbs width above the hill.  

i watched it for a bit, because it seemed out of place, and my wife has seen orange balls doing erratic things in the sky on several occasions at night over the last few years.  i watched it for a minute or so, and it didn't seem to move at all. i thought that maybe i was wrong, as it had a slightly wavering quality, like a twinkling star, and i began to think it really was a planet, and i was off my bearings.  

i bent over to pet the cat, and when i looked back up, i could swear it had moved a bit to the right.  i thought maybe my eyes were playing tricks on me, so i stood perfectly still and took a bearing off of the hill, my van and the tree next to it.  after a bit, i was sure it was slowly moving to the right. 

at this point, it stopped, and over maybe 2-3 seconds, it dramatically increased in size and brilliance.  it had a flux quality as it increased in brightness. not like a strobe, but wavering, as it rapidly increased in brilliance.  it grew to about the size of a matchhead held at arms length, maybe slightly smaller, and it was roughly the brightness of the moon, maybe a bit brighter.  i started to wonder if it was some sort of flare, but it didn't hold the peak intensity but maybe a second or two, then declined at the same rate as it had increased, returning to its original appearance and luminosity.

after returning to its original state, it changed direction, going back to the left, and it sped up.  it appeared to be moving at a similar rate to the jets that routinely pass over.  as it moved away, i started to wonder again if it was an aircraft, because i could make out a dim blinking light.  it passed behind the hill, and i didn't see it again.  over the next 45 minutes, i saw several jets pass over on their regular routes, but nothing else strange.

the only thing i can even remotely think off that would explain what i saw is some sort of helicopter.  that would explain the stationary positioning and the change in directions.  but for most of the sighting, it appeared to be a single orangish light.  i didn't hear any engine noise or rotors.  it doesn't explain the rapid increase in size and brightness.  it didn't seem to be the right color for a spotlight, and it didn't switch on and switch off.  it scaled up and back down in intensity.  i didn't see any beam or sweeping light, and it seemed to be too high for a spotlight search.  unless it was some sort of lamp that slowly powers up to maximum and back down again, and they only had it on for a few seconds, coincidentally pointed in exactly my direction, i can't explain what it did.

i see several planes pass over on regular routes, and we have helicopters that sometimes pass over on route to medical facilities, checking utilities (though not at night), and i've seen some choppers searching with spotlights, which i assume are law enforcement.  i even get the occasional low flying double rotor chopper teams flying over late at night, but i've never seen anything similar to what i saw tonight.

it was strange enough i thought i should report it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Appeared to be a dull orange object, looking a lot like a planet, about 20 degrees above the horizon in the e/ne sky. flared up, changed flight direction and flew off.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard getting some fresh air and happened to be looking toward my house which was to the south of me. a reddish orange light came flying over my house, several thousand feet up. i quickly went through the possibilities of what the light could be and eliminated all of them. it flew slightly faster than a plane, but had not other lights on it. it drifted slightly to my right, then back to my left. it's non-linear light made me realize it wasn't a plane or a meteor. i watched it go over a tree and continue north. the crazy part of this experience is that i yelled at it to stop - and it did. it held still for about 15 to 20 seconds. it sort of came back towards me, then slowly disappeared. another strange thing was that the while the light was visible, and for several minutes afterwards, there wasn't a single mosquito around me, which is really rare since they are thick right now and i can't be in my backyard without getting several bites every minute. it was truly the most amazing thing i've ever experienced.
content.summary: Reddish orange light going south to north.
